name: Splunk Enterprise
description: Index 500 MB/Day. Sign up and install now. After 60 days you can convert to a perpetual free license or purchase a Splunk Enterprise license to continue using the expanded functionality designed for enterprise-scale deployments.

notes.text: In order to install Splunk Enterprise you will need to sign-up for a free trial at https://www.splunk.com/en_us/download/splunk-enterprise.html. You will then need the Linux wget link for the .deb distribution of Splunk Enterprise.
The credentials to login can be found in application.creds.
